name: JamboLean速
description: JamboLean速's ability to lower blood glucose levels is two fold. It has been shown to increase the activity of glucose utilizing enzymes and has been shown to have hypoglycemic effects on blood sugar levels. JamboLean速 is a proprietary extract of the Jambol Tree which is native to Eastern India. The extract is removed from the seed of the fruit through a natural alcohol extraction, standardized and spray dried to form an easy to use powder with no residual solvents. The Jambol fruit seeds contain the chemical constituents Gallic acid, Oxalic acid, anti-oxidants, sterols, and Ellagic acid. Jambol fruit seeds have been used in folk medicine and as dietary supplements throughout the world for their anti-hyperglycemic effects. JamboLean速's ability to lower blood glucose levels is two fold. It has been shown to increase the activity of glucose utilizing enzymes and has been shown to have hypoglycemic effects on blood sugar levels.
